attributes.action: Re-think the proposals to create super surgeries for GP's
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I dont think enough thought has gone into this proposal. It has only been looked at from the side of the provision of care in a one stop shop environment. How are people supposed to travel to these surgeries when they have no car.How are the elderly and the infirm and people with kids supposed to get on a bus when they are unwell and in my case travel on 2 seperate buses for 8 miles to see a doctor when you feel ill.
This is another case of someone coming up with an idea without thinking it through from the users point of view

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
